welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nuenen, the charming village known for its stunning countryside and rich history of Vincent van Gogh. Get ready to immerse yourself in the beauty of this town and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Weeze Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
